mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WORKFLOW_INSTANCE (REQUEST_ID, WORKFLOW_NAME, INIT_INFO, STATUS, TIMEOUT_MILS, GMT_BEGIN) VALUES (#{requestId},#{workflowName},#{initInfo},#{status},#{timeoutMils}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM WORKFLOW_INSTANCE WHERE REQUEST_ID=#{requestId} AND WORKFLOW_NAME=#{workflowName}
mapper.update: UPDATE WORKFLOW_INSTANCE SET STATUS=#{status} WHERE REQUEST_ID=#{requestId} AND WORKFLOW_NAME=#{workflowName}
UPDATE WORKFLOW_INSTANCE SET GMT_END=#{gmtEnd} WHERE REQUEST_ID=#{requestId} AND WORKFLOW_NAME=#{workflowName}
UPDATE WORKFLOW_INSTANCE SET CURRENT_STEP=#{currentStep} WHERE REQUEST_ID=#{requestId} AND WORKFLOW_NAME=#{workflowName}
